title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861.
author: Victoria
snippet: A few miles on,we passed the field of battle of Luncarty, wheretradition says the Danes were beaten by Lord Er-roU's ancestor.

title: Journal of a Summer Tour in the Perthshire and Inverness-shire Highlands
author: Roger, James Cruikshank.
snippet: The storythat the Danish invaders were driven out ofIreland at the battle of Ulontarf, may be classedwith another story of like character, where it isalleged they were driven out of Scotland by thePloughman of Luncarty, the so-called progenitorof the Hays of Errol and Kiunoul, a fable whichhas lately been revived iti a History of the ScottishPeople from the Earliest Times, at present underissue by a well-known publishing firm, which to
